```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(dplyr)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
data ("rest_inspec")
```

```{r}
set.seed(1)

data("rest_inspec") 
rest_inspec = 
  rest_inspec %>%
  select(
     action, boro, critical_flag, cuisine_description, dba, score, grade) %>%
filter(
    !is.na(score), 
    boro == "MANHATTAN") %>%
  sample_n(5000)
```

##Plotly scatterplot showing 
```{r}
rest_scatterplot=
  rest_inspec %>%
  
  plot_ly(
    x = ~, y = ~, type = "scatter", mode = "markers",
    color = ~score, text = ~text_label, alpha = 0.5)
```

##Plotly boxplot showing distribution of scores among different cuisine descriptions 

```{r}
rest_boxplot =
  rest_inspec %>% 
  filter(
    cuisine_description %in% c("Pizza", "Americans","Tapas","Polish","Chinese","Irish")) %>%
  mutate(cuisine_description = fct_reorder(cuisine_description, score)) %>% 
  plot_ly(y = ~score, color = ~cuisine_description, type = "box",
          colors = "Set2")
```
